[[inst_c_movi]]
==== C.MOVI

*Syntax:* c.movi simm, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Compressed instruction variant (16-bit encoding).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_c_movi.svg[C.MOVI encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* ALU
